member.name: T:App.Core.Api.Startup.ConfigureSwaggerOptions
member.remarks: This allows API versioning to define a Swagger document per API version after the service has been resolved from the service container.

member.name: M:App.Core.Api.Startup.ConfigureSwaggerOptions.#ctor(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.IApiVersionDescriptionProvider)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The provider used to generate Swagger documents.

member.name: M:App.Core.Api.Startup.SwaggerDefaultValues.Apply(Microsoft.OpenApi.Models.OpenApiOperation,Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.OperationFilterContext)
member.summary: Applies the filter to the specified operation using the given context.
member.param: The operation to apply the filter to.
